settings.title: Settings
settings.displayScheduleDesc: Control TV screen on/off via HDMI-CEC. Raspberry Pi stays running.

update.title: Update Anthias
update.steps: Do the following steps to update Anthias:
update.step1: Go to the backup section and click Get Backup.
update.step2ssh: Open up a terminal and SSH to this device using any of the following commands:
update.step2sshSingle: Open up a terminal and SSH to this device using the following command
update.step3: Go to the project root directory
update.step4: Run the following upgrade script — ./bin/run_upgrade.sh. The script is essentially a wrapper around the install script, so it will prompt you with the same questions as when you first installed Anthias.

systemControls.title: System Controls
systemControls.rebootConfirm: Are you sure you want to reboot your device?
systemControls.shutdownConfirm: Are you sure you want to shutdown your device?
systemControls.shutdownSuccess:
Device shutdown has started successfully.
Soon you will be able to unplug the power from your Raspberry Pi.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.deviceNameDesc: The name of the device on first initialisation.
integrations.deviceUuidDesc: The unique identification number for the device. This is used to identify it on balena.
integrations.appIdDesc: ID number of the balena application the device is associated.
integrations.appNameDesc: The name of the balena application the device is associated with.
integrations.supervisorVersionDesc: The current version of the supervisor agent running on the device.
integrations.hostOsVersionDesc: The version of the host OS.

footer.digitalSignage: Want to get more out of your digital signage?

http404.title: Page Not Found
http404.message: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

slots.title: Time Slots
slots.markAsDefault: Default slot (plays when no other slot is active)
slots.defaultHint: The default slot plays content outside of scheduled time ranges. Only one default slot is allowed.
slots.noSlots: No schedule slots defined yet. Assets play in legacy mode (by active date range).
slots.noItems: No assets in this slot yet.
slots.noAvailableAssets: All assets are already in this slot, or no assets exist.
slots.durationOverridePlaceholder: Leave empty to use asset's default
slots.durationOverrideHint: Override the display duration for this asset in this slot only.
slots.deleteConfirm: Delete slot "{{name}}"? All items in this slot will be removed.
slots.addItemFailed: Failed to add asset to slot
slots.slotTypeDefaultDesc: Plays when no other slot is active. Only one allowed.
slots.slotTypeTimeDesc: Plays during a set time range on selected days of the week.
slots.slotTypeEventDesc: Plays content in order without looping. Highest priority.
slots.dateRangeHint: Optional: limit to a date range
slots.autoEndTime: End time is calculated from content duration

common.operationFailed: The operation failed. Please reload the page and try again.
